summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4453 for the improvement of 4th Avenue Northwest, from West 55th Street to West 65th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, but paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52764, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
